commands: test ! -d SERVICE_PREFIX/database/base && SERVICE_ROOT/exports/initdb -D SERVICE_PREFIX/database && rm -f SERVICE_PREFIX/database/pg_hba.conf && rm -f SERVICE_PREFIX/database/postgresql.conf

expectStdOut: database system is ready to accept connections

commands:
test ! -f SERVICE_PREFIX/database/pg_hba.conf && printf '
# Default Postgresql service configuration
local all all trust
host all all 127.0.0.1/32 password

# host all all 0.0.0.0/0 ident
host all all 0.0.0.0/0 password

' > SERVICE_PREFIX/database/pg_hba.conf

test ! -f SERVICE_PREFIX/database/postgresql.conf && printf '
port = SERVICE_PORT
max_connections = 200
checkpoint_segments = 24
password_encryption = on
shared_buffers = 128MB
temp_buffers = 32MB
work_mem = 16MB
max_stack_depth = 16MB

' > SERVICE_PREFIX/database/postgresql.conf
